name: Arco Nano
hero_image_alt: Arco Nano ultra-compact espresso machine in matte white on a narrow kitchen shelf beside a potted succulent, pulling espresso into a small glass cup, the machine barely larger than a hardback book, bright Scandinavian-style interior with pale birch surfaces
headline: Everything you need. Nothing you don't.
subheadline: An ultra-compact espresso machine that heats up in 60 seconds and fits anywhere — proof that great espresso doesn't require a large footprint.
description_short: An ultra-compact espresso machine with 60-second heat-up that fits on any countertop, shelf, or desk.
description_long: The Arco Nano was designed around a single question: what is the smallest machine that can produce genuinely good espresso? The answer is 20 cm tall, heats up in 60 seconds, and uses a 53mm portafilter that produces balanced, full-bodied shots. The thermoblock system is efficient and responsive, and the 0.8L tank lasts a full weekend of double shots. Whether you live in a studio apartment, want espresso at the office, or need a second machine for a small space, the Nano proves that constraints inspire better design.

key_specs.pressure: 15 bar vibratory pump (9 bar at group)
key_specs.material: ABS body with stainless steel internals
key_specs.cup_clearance: Up to 8 cm (espresso cups and small glasses)

use_case_headline: Perfect for small spaces and first-time espresso drinkers.
use_case_body: The Nano is for anyone who wants real espresso without surrendering counter space. It thrives in studio kitchens, home offices, and guest rooms — anywhere you want a good cup without a large commitment.

pairing_products.rationale: A compact grinder that matches the Nano's small-footprint philosophy.
A small precision scale and tamper upgrade will improve your shots immediately.
